heading: Season 8 Hotfix 2 – May 2 – Patch 2.2.0

Don't forget to check out our Season 8 Compendium describing the massive 2.2.0 Patch Maxroll update! Looking for the best builds out there to get the most out of your Season 8 experience? Take a look at our updated Season 8 Tier Lists! We hope you enjoy the Season of Belial's Return with the aid of our Season 8 compendium update.
